column2: Enable brace highlighting for read-only viewers

column3: The current implementation of brace highlighter is written in such a way that brace highlighting is disabled for editors in read-only mode (editor.isViewer()==true). There is no obvious reason to do that, so this one-liner pull-request enables brace highlighting in this situation. Brace Highlighting tests in platform.lang.test pass normally after this change.
Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
Do I need one if I am already a JB employee? Did this anyway.
@chashnikov You've disabled brace highlighting for viewers long time ago (in commit 4887978 with message "FBQ-11657 fixed"). Any chance you remember why it was done?

@JB-Dmitry This was done 15 years ago, unfortunately I don't remember why I did that. The issue is from JIRA project for JetBrains Fabrique product which was never released and this JIRA instance isn't available anymore. So I think it's ok to revert my change.
Enable brace highlighting for read-only viewers
